trans-unit.source: Represents the strip lines on a chart.
trans-unit.target: Representerer stripelinjer i et diagram.

trans-unit.source: Strip lines, or strips, are horizontal or vertical ranges that shade the background of a chart in regular or custom intervals.
trans-unit.target: Stripelinjer eller striper, er vannrett eller loddrett områder som skyggelegger bakgrunn for et diagram i jevne eller egendefinerte mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: You can use strip lines to: - Improve readability for looking up individual values on the chart.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke stripelinjer til:-forbedre lese for å søke etter enkeltverdier i diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: - Separate data points when reading the chart.
trans-unit.target: -Skill datapunkter under lesing av diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: - Highlight dates that occur at regular intervals, for example, to identify weekend data points.
trans-unit.target: -Uthev datoer som forekommer regelmessig, for eksempel finne helgen data mot.

trans-unit.source: - Highlight a specific key range of data.
trans-unit.target: -Fremheve bestemte key dataområdet.

trans-unit.source: - Add a threshold line at a specific constant value.
trans-unit.target: -Legg til en linje terskelen på en konstant verdi.

trans-unit.source: A single StripLine object can either be drawn once, or repeatedly, for a given interval.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt StripLine-objekt kan enten hentes fra én eller flere ganger, for et gitt intervall.

trans-unit.source: This action is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne handlingen kontrolleres av de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a value of zero is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property, one strip line will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien null er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>egenskapen, én stripe linje skal tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a non-zero value is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property, a strip line will be drawn repeatedly at each given interval.
trans-unit.target: Når en ikke-nullverdi er tilordnet til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>egenskapen stripe-linje skal tegnes gjentatte ganger ved hvert angitte intervall.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location where a strip line is drawn is also affected by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffsetType%2A> properties of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen der stripe-linje skal tegnes også er berørt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffsetType%2A>Egenskaper for stripe linje.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffsetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Strip lines are always associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: Stripelinjer er alltid knyttet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>

trans-unit.source: They can be added at both design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: De kan legges ved både utformingen og kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: To add a horizontal or vertical line to display a threshold, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til en vannrett eller loddrett linje for å vise en terskel, angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>til en verdi for 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will result in a line being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil føre til en linje i.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> properties for the color, width and style of the line.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A>Egenskaper for fargen, bredden og linjestilen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: No chart background properties (`Back*`) are used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Ingen diagrammet bakgrunnen-egenskaper (`Back*`) brukes når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>er satt til 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Text%2A> property of the strip line to associate text with a strip line.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Text%2A>for stripe-linje skal tilknyttes en stripe-linje.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The placement and orientation of this text can be controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextAlignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Plassering og retningen på denne teksten kan kontrolleres av de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextAlignment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.TextAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: When multiple strip lines are defined for the same axis, it is possible that the strip lines will overlap.
trans-unit.target: Når flere stripelinjer er definert for den samme aksen, er det mulig at stripelinjer vil overlapper.

trans-unit.source: The Z-order of StripLine objects is determined by their order of occurrence in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLinesCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Z-rekkefølgen StripLine som er avhengig av rekkefølgen for forekomsten i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLinesCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLinesCollection>

trans-unit.source: This means that the first occurrence is drawn first; the second occurrence is drawn second, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at den første forekomsten tegnes først. den andre forekomsten tegnes andre, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Strip lines are not supported for the following chart types: Pie, Doughnut, Funnel, Pyramid, Kagi, ThreeLineBreak, PointAndFigure, Polar and Radar.
trans-unit.target: Stripelinjer støttes ikke for følgende diagramtyper: sektor hjuldiagrammer, trakten, pyramide, Kagi, ThreeLineBreak, PointAndFigure, Polært og radardiagram.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: To set a gradient for the strip line, set the BackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Angi bakgrunnsfargen for å angi gradering for stripe linje, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—in other words, set the alpha value to 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the element.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne fargen til "gjennomsiktig" – med andre ord, setter du Alfa verdien til 0, ingen farge som skal tilordnes til bakgrunn for elementet.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen vil resultatet være gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A> property will determine the color of the line, not this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>er satt til 0,0, en linje skal tegnes og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>bestemme fargen på linje, ikke denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.White*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.White*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.White*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gradering stilen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: The BackGradientStyle property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackGradientStyle bestemmer om et diagramelement vises gradering, i tillegg til retningen på graderingen, hvis brukt.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger:-Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>til å angi farge for primær.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>til å angi den sekundære fargen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set this BackGradientStyle property of the chart element to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Angi denne BackGradientStyle-egenskapen for diagramelementet ønsket gradering stil.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen settes til en verdi av 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen skravering for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: Skravering mønsteret består av en fylt bakgrunnsfarge og linjer tegnes over bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: To fargene som brukes i skraveringsstilen er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen settes til en verdi av 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: The BackImage property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackImage definerer en bane til et bakgrunnsbilde for mange diagramelementer, og er en absolutt eller relativ URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: To position this image, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å plassere dette bildet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi at én farge som skal vises som bildet som "gjennomsiktig" ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Et bilde kan være en gyldig grafikkfil som støttes av .NET Framework, inkludert ikonene.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen settes til en verdi av 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunn overstyrer andre bakgrunnsegenskaper, for eksempel gradering farger.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents an image file's URL.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer en bildefil URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for bakgrunnsbilde for.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer denne egenskapen justering for bakgrunnsbilde for stripelinjer; Det er bare brukt når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageWrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about available alignments, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tilgjengelige justeringer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en farge som skal erstattes med en gjennomsiktig farge når bakgrunnsbildet tegnes.

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen settes til en verdi av 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som skal vises som gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnemodus for bakgrunnsbilde for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer hvordan bildet vises. Det vil si side ved side, skalert og så videre.

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et bilde skaleres, skal den strekkes for å passe i avgrensende stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet side ved side, tegnes den gjentatte ganger fra øvre venstre hjørnet.

trans-unit.source: For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om de tilgjengelige wrapping modiene, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: If the BackImageWrapMode property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen BackImageWrapMode er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, plasseringen der bildet tegnes bestemmes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackImageAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>er satt til en verdi av 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> integer enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sekundære fargen for stripe linje bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer sekundære bakgrunnsfargen for mange objekter i diagrammet, og brukes når gradering farger brukes.

trans-unit.source: You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi sekundær bakgrunnsfarge til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skravering brukes, angir egenskapen BackSecondaryColor fargen på linjene skravering.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger for bakgrunn for et diagramelement:-Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>til å angi farge for primær.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use this BackSecondaryColor property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: – Bruk denne BackSecondaryColor-egenskapen til å angi den sekundære fargen.

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A>egenskapen ønsket gradering stilen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property is set to a value of 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen settes til en verdi av 0,0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi angitt for den sekundære fargen for Bakgrunn skravering eller gradering fyll.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjefargen for stripe-linje.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn, and it is this property and not the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> property setting that will determine the color of the line.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>objektet er satt til 0,0, en linje skal tegnes, og det er denne egenskapen og ikke av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen som bestemmer fargen på linjen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the line style used for a border.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir linjestilen som brukes for en kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted or some variation of solid and dotted.
trans-unit.target: Linjen kan være fylt, prikket eller en variasjon av fylt og prikkete.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir kantlinjestilen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelsen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: This property is measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen måles i piksler.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the width of the strip line's border, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som bestemmer bredden på kantlinjen for stripe-linje, i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font used for the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften som brukes for stripe linje teksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> value that represents the font of the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> verdi som angir skriften for stripe linje tekst.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på stripe linje tekst.

trans-unit.source: You can specify any valid ARGB color for this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en gyldig ARGB farge for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when a text value is specified for the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når en tekstverdi som er angitt for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the text color of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer tekstfargen for stripe-linje.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval for a strip line, and determines if the strip line is drawn once or repeatedly.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir intervallet for stripe-linje, og angir Hvis stripe linje tegnes én eller flere ganger.

trans-unit.source: When you set the Interval property to a value of zero, one strip line will be displayed, with a width specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt egenskapen intervall til en null-verdi, en stripe linje vises, med en bredde som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set Interval to a value of other than zero, multiple strip lines will be shown.
trans-unit.target: Når du setter intervallet til en verdi forskjellig fra null, vises flere stripelinjer.

trans-unit.source: The unit that is used for the Interval property is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Enhet som brukes for egenskapen intervall er definert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the interval between strip lines.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer intervallet mellom stripelinjer.

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines, tick marks, strip lines and axis labels.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen for rutenett aksemerkene, stripelinjer og akseetiketter.

trans-unit.source: The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
trans-unit.target: Intervallforskyvning for aksemerker på delskala og rutenett aldri er berørt av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IntervalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IntervalOffset property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset.
trans-unit.target: IntervalOffset egenskapsinnstillingen definerer målenheten for forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> can be a negative value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>kan være en negativ verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Auto` (`0`).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `Auto` (`0`).

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the interval offset.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer intervallforskyvning.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval offset type of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen intervalltypen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>; the actual value of this property is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen settes som standard til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>; den faktiske verdien for egenskapen fastsettes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.IntervalType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> nummereringsverdi som angir intervalltypen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval type of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir intervalltypen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Interval types can be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, in which case the type depends on: the X-value or Y-value types of the plotted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects—depending on which axis the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> objects belong to—and the axis scale.
trans-unit.target: Intervallet typer kan settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, da avhenger av: typene X-verdi eller Y-verdien for den tegnede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>objekter, avhengig av hvilken akse den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>objekter som hører til, og akseskala.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A> property determines how often a strip or line is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>egenskapen bestemmer hvor ofte stripe eller linje skal tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the interval type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> nummereringsverdi som angir intervalltypen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på en stripe-linje.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set to a value less than zero, otherwise an exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis til en verdi mindre enn null, hvis et unntak vil oppstå.

trans-unit.source: A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> property settings for its color, width and style.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen 0,0 vil føre til en linje som; Denne linjen vil bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A>egenskapsinnstillingene for farge, bredde og stil.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of StripWidth is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Ingen av de `Back*` egenskapene i denne klassen brukes når verdien for StripWidth 0,0.

trans-unit.source: If you set the StripWidth property to a value greater than zero, a strip will be created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt egenskapen StripWidth til en verdi større enn null, opprettes en stripe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A>Egenskaper gjelder bare for kantlinjen for stripe; alle de `Back*` egenskaper deretter brukes til egenskapene bakgrunn for stripen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderDashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the StripWidth property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for egenskapen StripWidth er større enn 0,0, bestemmes enhetene av skalaen som er relevante for aksen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir om det tegnes en stripe eller linje.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir målenheten for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth*>

trans-unit.source: This property determines the units used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angir enhetene som brukes for denne egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> property to one (1.0).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en stripe linje som representerer "én uke", kan du for eksempel angi denne egenskapen til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A>til en (1.0).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine.StripWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of this property from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> to a <xref:System.DateTime> value when the relevant axis scale uses a <xref:System.DateTime> value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre verdien for egenskapen fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>til en <xref:System.DateTime>verdi når relevante aksen skalaen bruker en <xref:System.DateTime>verdi.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the width type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir hvilken bredde.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add text to a strip line.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å legge til tekst i en stripe-linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer teksten for stripe-linje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstjusteringen for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the strip line text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> verdi som representerer justeringen stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text line alignment of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstjusteringen for linje for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the text line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> verdi som Representer justering av tekstlinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir retningen for teksten.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextOrientation>, the text is oriented based on the chart type.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til en verdi av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextOrientation>, teksten er innrettet basert på diagramtypen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextOrientation>

trans-unit.source: For all X-Y chart types other than Bar, X-axis strip line text is oriented horizontally from left to right on the bottom of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: Teksten er innrettet vannrett fra venstre mot høyre nederst på stripe linje for alle X-Y diagramtyper andre enn Coolbar x-aksen stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: For Bar charts, X-axis strip line text is oriented vertically from top to bottom to the right of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: X-aksen stripe linje teksten er for liggende, objektorientert fra topp til bunn til høyre for stripe linje.

trans-unit.source: A TextOrientation value that represents the alignment of the text orientation.
trans-unit.target: TextOrientation-verdi som Representer justering av tekstretning.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of a strip line.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verktøytips for stripe-linje.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip of the strip line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir verktøytips for stripe linje.
